definition: joy/to joke/to banter/to tease/to mock/Taiwan pr. [nu:e4]

sentences.english: Scherzo, Four Pieces for piano No. 4

sentences.english: The second part of the paper is the musicology analysis of the third banters tune of Chopin.

sentences.english: The scherzo is marked allegro molto .
sentences.chinese: 諧謔曲也可以是很快的快板的。
